title: 交通部觀光署東部海岸國家風景區管理處所屬景區入園清潔維護費收費標準
title_en: Fee-charging Standards for the Cleaning and Maintenance of the Scenic Areas Managed by East Coast National Scenic Area Headquarters, Tourism Administration, Ministry of Transportation and Communications
short_name: Fee-charging Standards for the Cleaning and Maintenance of the Scenic Areas Mana
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 行政＞交通部＞觀光目. Articles extracted: 3.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 本標準依規費法第十條第一項第二款規定訂定之。

provisions.title: 第 2 條
provisions.content: 本處入園清潔維護費收費景區及收費基準如附表。
